Name: Rampart Company
Details: Rampart Company is a flexible, agile fighting force designed to carry out shadow operations in coordination with a supporting Mercenary Command. Formed during 'Operation Restored Hope' under the command of Karen 'Sunbird' Andris. The Rampart company is comprised from a select group of 'Headhunted' Mercenary Units, reportedly a dozen or more. Company's habitual use of deception and false flag operations, it is difficult to say with certainty how many engagements they have participated in since their inception.
